damageCards.name: Shaken
damageCards.description:
Flip 1 fear faceup.
Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Short of Breath
damageCards.description:
Discard all of your boons.
Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Cursed Injury
damageCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
If you would discard a faceup damage, flip it facedown instead.

damageCards.name: Dazed
damageCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
Before you interact with a threat token, yhou must spend 1 inspiration.

damageCards.name: Exhaustion
damageCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
When you scout during the rally phase, you cannot place cards back on top of your deck.

damageCards.name: Putrid Boils
damageCards.description:
Each nearby hero flips 1 fear faceup.
Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Concussion
damageCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
Decrease each of your stats by 1.
At the end of your turn, flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Entangled
damageCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
When you perform the travel action, move 1 fewer space.
After you rest, flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Crushed
damageCards.description:
Deplete 1 of your trinkets (without resolving its effect).
Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Feeble
damageCards.description:
Suffer 1 facedown fear.
Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Fever
damageCards.description:
Discard 1 inspiration.
Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Sudden Sickness
damageCards.description:
Discard all of your inspiration.
Then discard this card.

damageCards.name: Deep Bruise
damageCards.description:
Discard 2 prepared cards or suffer 2 facedown damage.
Then discard this card.

damageCards.name: Stunned
damageCards.description:
Flip 1 damage and 1 fear faceup.
Then discard this card.

damageCards.name: Knocked Prone
damageCards.description:
Deplete 1 of your trinkets (without resolving its effect) and discard 1 prepared card.
Then discard this card.

damageCards.name: Poison
damageCards.description:
Gain 1 weakness and shuffle it into your deck.
Then discard this card.

damageCards.name: Laceration
damageCards.description:
Flip 1 damage faceup.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Surrender
fearCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
If you would discard a faceup fear, flip it facedown instead.

fearCards.name: Delusions
fearCards.description:
Discard 1 inspiration.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Anxiety
fearCards.description:
Flip 1 fear faceup.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Cower
fearCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
When you attack, reveal 1 fewer card.
During your turn, if you are emboldened, you may discard this card.

fearCards.name: Troubled
fearCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
After you or a nearby hero suffers 1 or more fear from darkness, that hero suffers 1 additional fear.

fearCards.name: Rage
fearCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
You cannot prevent damage (including negate tests).
When you attack, add 2 hits.

fearCards.name: Impending Doom
fearCards.description:
Discard 1 prepared card or suffer 1 fear.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Tormented
fearCards.description:
Flip 1 damage faceup.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Greed
fearCards.description:
Deplete another hero's trinket (without resolving its effect).
If you cannot, suffer 1 facedown fear.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Dark Whispers
fearCards.description:
Keep this card faceup.
At the end of your turn, suffer 1 fear.
When you test Wisdom or Wit, add 1 success.

fearCards.name: Hopelessness
fearCards.description:
Discard 2 prepared cards or suffer 2 facedown fear.
Then discard this card.

fearCards.name: Looming Shadows
fearCards.description:
If you are in a space with darkness, suffer 1 fear.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Ill WIll
fearCards.description:
Each other hero suffers 1 facedown fear.
Then discard this card.

fearCards.name: Hysteria
fearCards.description:
You and each nerby hero suffer 1 damage.
Then discard this card.

fearCards.name: Paranoia
fearCards.description:
If there is a nearby hero, discard 1 prepared card.
Then flip this card facedown.

fearCards.name: Infighting
fearCards.description:
Each nearby hero flips 1 damage faceup.
Then flip this card facdown.

fearCards.name: Overcome
fearCards.description:
Suffer 1 facedown fear.
Then flip this card facedown.
